name: AbstractAiAppBar
desc: Represents an abstract app bar for AI-integrated applications.

name: backgroundOpacity
desc: Determines the background opacity of the app bar.

desc: Gets the icon to display on the left side of the app bar.

desc: Gets the callback function to execute when the left icon is tapped.

name: rightIcon
desc: Gets the icon to display on the right side of the app bar.

name: rightTapFunction
desc: Gets the callback function to execute when the right icon is tapped.

name: title
desc: Gets the title text to display in the app bar.

name: AbstractAiButton
desc: Represents an abstract button with AI capabilities.

name: androidBackgroundColor
desc: Gets the background color used in Android-specific styling of the button.

name: androidPadding
desc: Gets the padding used in Android-specific styling of the button.

name: backgroundColor
desc: Gets the background color of the button.

name: borderSide
desc: Gets the width of the border surrounding the button.

name: clickFunction
desc: Gets the function to execute when the button is tapped.

name: foregroundColor
desc: Gets the foreground color (usually the color of the text or icon) of the button.

name: height
desc: Gets the height of the button.

name: iosBackgroundColor
desc: Gets the background color used in iOS-specific styling of the button.

name: iosPadding
desc: Gets the padding used in iOS-specific styling of the button.

name: isFixedSize
desc: Determines if the button has a fixed size.

name: padding
desc: Gets the padding around the button's content.

name: text
desc: Gets the text displayed on the button.

name: textStyle
desc: Gets the style of the text displayed on the button.

name: width
desc: Gets the width of the button.

name: AbstractAiClickableCard
desc: Represents an abstract clickable card with customizable properties.

name: androidBackgroundColor
desc: Gets the background color used in Android-specific styling of the card.

name: androidElevation
desc: Gets the elevation of the card in Android-specific styling.

name: androidShadowColor
desc: Gets the color of the shadow cast by the card in Android-specific styling.

name: bgColor
desc: Gets the background color of the card.

name: borderRadius
desc: Gets the border radius of the card.

name: caption
desc: Gets the caption text of the card.

name: child
desc: Gets the optional child widget to display inside the card.

name: clickFunction
desc: Gets the function to execute when the card is tapped.

name: clipBehavior
desc: Gets the clipping behavior for the card.

name: decorImage
desc: Gets the path or URL of the decorative image on the card.

name: description
desc: Gets the description text of the card.

name: elevation
desc: Gets the elevation of the card (depth effect).

name: fit
desc: Gets how the card's content should be inscribed into the available space.

name: height
desc: Gets the height of the card.

name: iosBackgroundColor
desc: Gets the background color used in iOS-specific styling of the card.

name: margin
desc: Gets the margin around the card.

name: shadowColor
desc: Gets the color of the shadow cast by the card.

name: shape
desc: Gets the shape of the card's border.

name: surfaceTintColor
desc: Gets the tint color applied to the surface of the card.

name: textStyle
desc: Gets the style for the caption and description text.

name: width
desc: Gets the width of the card.

name: AbstractAiNavigationBar
desc: Manages the navigation bar in an AI-integrated application.

name: cupertinoItems
desc: Gets the list of bottom navigation bar items for Cupertino design.

name: index
desc: Gets the index of the currently active tab in the navigation bar.

name: materialItems
desc: Gets the list of bottom navigation bar items for Material design.

name: onTapFunction

name: AbstractAiTextFormField
desc: Defines a text input field within an AI-driven context.

name: borderRadius
desc: Gets the border radius of the input field.

name: borderSide
desc: Gets the width of the border around the input field.

name: contentPadding
desc: Gets the padding around the content of the input field.

name: controller
desc: Gets the controller for the text in the input field.

name: fillColor
desc: Gets the color used to fill the input field.

name: filled
desc: Determines whether the input field is filled with a color.

name: focusNode
desc: Gets the focus node for managing the input field's focus state.

name: hintText
desc: Gets the hint text to display when the input field is empty.

name: keyboardType
desc: Gets the type of keyboard to display for the text input field.

name: maxLines
desc: Gets the maximum number of lines the input field allows.

name: obscureText
desc: Determines whether the input field obscures the text entered (for passwords).

name: obscuringCharacter
desc: Gets the character used to obscure text if obscureText is true.

name: onChangedFunction
desc: Gets the callback function to execute when the input text changes.

name: onFieldSubmitFunction
desc: Gets the function to execute when the user submits the input field (e.g., pressing enter).

name: onTapOutSide
desc: Gets the function to execute when the user taps outside the input field.

name: prefixIcon
desc: Gets the widget to display before the input field (prefix).

name: readOnly
desc: Determines whether the input field is read-only.

name: suffixIcon
desc: Gets the widget to display after the input field (suffix).

name: validator
desc: Gets the validation function to apply to the input text.

name: AuthenticationService
desc: Defines the contract for an authentication service.

name: checkIfEmailExists
desc: Checks if the provided email exists in the system.

name: checkIfUserIsVerified
desc: Checks if the current user's email is verified.

name: createUserWithEmailAndPassword
desc: Creates a new user account with email and password.

name: getCurrentUser
desc: Retrieves the currently authenticated User.

name: getDisplayName
desc: Retrieves the display name of the current user.

name: getUserEmail
desc: Retrieves the email of the current user.

name: sendDisplayName
desc: Sends the display name name to the current user's profile.

name: sendEmailVerification
desc: Sends an email verification to the current user.

name: sendPasswordResetEmail
desc: Sends a password reset email to the specified email.

name: signInWithEmailAndPassword
desc: Signs in a user with provided email and password.

name: signOut
desc: Signs out the currently authenticated user.

RiverpodLogger is an abstract class that extends ProviderObserver.
It defines methods for observing changes in providers.

name: AndroidAiClickableCard
desc: A customizable card component tailored for Android platforms, adhering to Material Design guidelines.

name: AndroidAiClickableCard
desc: Creates an instance of AndroidAiClickableCard.

name: androidBackgroundColor
desc: The Android-specific background color. Overrides bgColor when set.

name: androidElevation
desc: The elevation shadow depth specific to Android styling.

name: androidShadowColor
desc: The color of the shadow cast by the card specific to Android styling.

name: bgColor
desc: The background color of the card. Defaults to the theme's card color if not specified.

name: borderRadius
desc: The border radius of the card.

name: build
desc: Builds the visual structure of the card widget.

name: caption
desc: The caption text displayed on the card.

name: child
desc: An optional widget to display within the card, typically used for content that isn't just text.

name: clickFunction
desc: The callback function that is called when the card is tapped.

name: clipBehavior
desc: The behavior when a clip is applied to the card.

name: decorImage
desc: The image to display on the card, typically an asset path.

name: description
desc: The description text displayed beneath the caption.

name: elevation
desc: The z-coordinate at which to place the card. This controls the size of the shadow below the card.

name: fit
desc: Specifies how the image should be inscribed into the available space.

name: height
desc: The height of the card. If null, the card will size itself to its parent's height.

name: iosBackgroundColor
desc: No use. A placeholder for iOS-specific background color. Throws UnimplementedError as it's not implemented.

name: margin
desc: Empty space to surround the card.

name: shadowColor
desc: The color of the shadow cast by the card.

name: shape
desc: The shape of the card's material.

name: surfaceTintColor
desc: The color of the material's surface tint.

name: textStyle
desc: The text style to use for text within the card.

name: width
desc: The width of the card. If null, the card will size itself to its parent's width.

desc: Constructs an AndroidTextFormField with the given properties.

name: borderRadius
desc: The border radius of the text field.

name: borderSide
desc: The width of the border around the text field.

name: build
desc: Builds the visual structure of the text form field widget.

name: contentPadding
desc: Padding around the content of the field.

name: controller
desc: Controller for the text being edited.

name: fillColor
desc: The background color of the text field when filled is true.

name: filled
desc: Whether the text field is filled with a color (specified by fillColor).

name: focusNode
desc: Focus node for managing the focus of the text field.

name: hintText
desc: Placeholder text that appears when the field is empty.

name: keyboardType
desc: The type of keyboard to use for editing the text.

name: maxLines
desc: Maximum number of lines the field can occupy.

name: obscureText
desc: Whether the text should be obscured (useful for passwords).

name: obscuringCharacter
desc: The character used to obscure text if obscureText is true.

name: onChangedFunction
desc: Callback function triggered when the field's content is changed.

name: onFieldSubmitFunction
desc: Callback function triggered when the user indicates they are done editing the text (e.g., by pressing the 'submit' button on the keyboard).

name: onTapOutSide
desc: Callback function triggered when the user taps outside the text field.

name: prefixIcon
desc: An optional widget to display at the start of the field.

name: readOnly
desc: Whether the text can be changed.

name: suffixIcon
desc: An optional widget to display at the end of the field.

name: validator
desc: Function that returns a validation error message based on the current field value.

name: AssistantsScreen

A screen that displays various assistant features to the user.
c
This screen is part of the main navigation flow of the app and allows users to interact with different assistant functionalities.
It includes a customizable app bar and an interactive body with options like story generation.

name: androidFillColor
desc: The background color to use for the text field when the platform is Android.

desc: The border radius of the text field.

desc: The background color of the text field.

name: filled
desc: Whether the text field is filled with a color (specified by fillColor).

desc: Focus node for managing the focus of the text field.

name: hintText
desc: Placeholder text that appears when the field is empty.

name: iosFillColor
desc: The background color to use for the text field when the platform is iOS.

name: keyboardType
desc: The type of keyboard to use for editing the text.

name: maxLines
desc: Maximum number of lines the field can occupy.

name: obscureText
desc: Whether the text should be obscured (useful for passwords).

name: obscuringCharacter
desc: The character used to obscure text if obscureText is true.

name: onChangedFunction
desc: Callback function triggered when the field's content is changed.

name: onFieldSubmitFunction
desc: Callback function triggered when the user indicates they are done editing the text (e.g., by pressing the 'submit' button on the keyboard).

desc: Callback function triggered when the user taps outside the text field.

name: prefixIcon
desc: An optional widget to display at the start of the field.

name: readOnly
desc: Whether the text can be changed.

name: suffixIcon
desc: An optional widget to display at the end of the field.

name: ui
desc: A utility for selecting the appropriate widget factory based on the platform.

name: validator
desc: Function that returns a validation error message based on the current field value.
